typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
source(output(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
moviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating
	)) ~> Select1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Title,
		RottenTom
	)) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 join(soundex(Select1@title) == soundex(Select2@Title),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
